title: 96/32/EC: Commission Decision of 19 December 1995 amending Decision 93/13/EEC laying down the procedures for veterinary checks at Community border inspection posts on products from third countries
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 19 December 1995 amending Decision 93/13/EEC laying down the procedures for veterinary checks at Community border inspection posts on products from third countries (96/32/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following paragraph is added to Article 5 of Decision 93/13/EEC:
'4. However, for fish caught for recreation and introduced into Finland or Sweden from Norway or Russia in the personal luggage of travellers for direct consumption by private individuals, the weight limit provided for in paragraph 1 is put at a maximum of 15 kg or one fish of any weight.`
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 December 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 373, 31. 12. 1990, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 9, 15. 1. 1993, p. 33.
(3) OJ No L 133, 28. 5. 1994, p. 50.
